value.stringValue: [Opportunity].CATM_Record__c = TRUE && OR( AND([Opportunity].Region__c = 'IBG', TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) = 'Analyzing', ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName)), AND([Opportunity].Region__c = 'IBG', TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) = 'Validating', ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName)) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_11
formulas.expression: {!myVariable_current.CATM_Record__c} = TRUE && OR( AND({!myVariable_current.Region__c} = 'IBG', TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) = 'Analyzing', ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.StageName})), AND({!myVariable_current.Region__c} = 'IBG', TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) = 'Validating', ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.StageName})) )
